main_block.title: Game Hosting
main_block.description: Now hosting your game server is easier than ever. Order convenient game hosting!

operation_systems_block.title: Ready-to-Install Game Templates
operation_systems_block.description: Choose a suitable game server from 40+ ready-to-use images. If the game or service you need is not listed, our staff will add it for you!

main_info_block.title: Game Server Control Panel
main_info_block.description: An incredibly practical Pterodactyl panel with all the necessary functions for comprehensive administration of any game server.

main_info_block.title: File Upload via Panel and sFTP
main_info_block.description: Upload your server files at maximum speed. This can be done both through the web panel and via sFTP.

main_info_block.title: MySQL Databases
main_info_block.description: Store your service data in an orderly and reliable manner. Specifically for this, we provide each client with access to the database.

main_info_block.title: DDoS Protection
main_info_block.description: Standard DDoS attack protection is provided by default on all tariffs. Conduct events on your servers comfortably!

not_finded_information_block.title: Didn't Find What You Were Looking For?

faqItems.question: What is game hosting?
faqItems.answerDescription: This service is specifically designed for launching game servers and maintaining their round-the-clock operation. We offer over 40 different types of games. From a technical point of view, our game hosting is no different from regular virtual servers (VDS), but the key difference lies in access and management methods. While VDS is managed through SSH or RDP protocols, our game hosting provides a convenient control panel optimized specifically for gaming needs.

faqItems.question: What games does your hosting support?
faqItems.answerTitle: What games does your hosting support?
faqItems.answerDescription: We support a wide range of popular games, including hits like Minecraft, Garry’s Mod, and GTA. Our game catalog regularly expands to meet players' requests. If your game is not in the list, please let us know. We will make every effort to add it specifically for you.

faqItems.question: Can I install my own mods or plugins on the server?
faqItems.answerTitle: Can I install my own mods or plugins on the server?
faqItems.answerDescription: You can install any plugins and mods on your game server; we do not restrict this. Uploading and configuring any additions is available within your server's files.

faqItems.question: Is there a limit on the number of players on my server?
faqItems.answerTitle: Is there a limit on the number of players on my server?
faqItems.answerDescription: No limitations! All our tariffs provide completely unlimited slots for your servers.

faqItems.question: Is it possible to install multiple servers on one tariff?
faqItems.answerTitle: Is it possible to install multiple servers on one tariff?
faqItems.answerDescription: Certainly! You can install any number of servers on any ports within one tariff. Everything is limited only by the purchased resources.

faqItems.question: How can I transfer data to my server?
faqItems.answerTitle: How can I transfer data to my server?
faqItems.answerDescription: You can do this by transferring files to the new server. If you need help, please create a support request. Our staff will transfer all the required data to your new server completely free of charge.

support_block.title: Online Support Chat
support_block.description: Have questions? Write to us in chat! Support 24/7
